data.eml:eml: Taxonomy of Afrotropical and West Palaearctic ants of the ponerine genus Hypoponera Santschi (Hymenoptera: Formicidae).

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bolton, B., Fisher, B. L. (2011): Taxonomy of Afrotropical and West Palaearctic ants of the ponerine genus Hypoponera Santschi (Hymenoptera: Formicidae). Zootaxa 2843: 1-118, URL: http://antbase.org/ants/publications/23490/23490.pdf
